where-is-lamb.context: Isaac's question to Abraham on Moriah
where-is-lamb.hebrew: הִנֵּה הָאֵשׁ וְהָעֵצִים וְאַיֵּה הַשֶּׂה לְעֹלָה
where-is-lamb.english: Here is the fire and the wood, but where is the lamb for the burnt offering?

god-will-provide.hebrew: אֱלֹהִים יִרְאֶה לּוֹ הַשֶּׂה לְעֹלָה בְּנִי
god-will-provide.english: God will provide for Himself the lamb

room-for-us.context: Naming a well after finding space
room-for-us.english: Now the LORD has made room for us

voice-is-jacob.hebrew: הַקֹּל קוֹל יַעֲקֹב וְהַיָּדַיִם יְדֵי עֵשָׂו
voice-is-jacob.english: The voice is Jacob's voice, but the hands are Esau's hands

two-nations.english: Two nations are in your womb, and the older shall serve the younger

loved-her.english: He loved her, and was comforted after his mother's death

blessed-indeed.english: Indeed, and he shall be blessed
